section.p: He is happy to have a companion on his quest. You tell your men to take the ship to Yellowport, where you will join them later. Then you climb up behind him and fly off.
The sea whips past far below, then you are over the coast and speeding north. Glimpsed through wispy cloud, the farms and villages look like toys.
The horse rears - you don’t know why. Realizing he is losing control of his mount, the hero urges it closer to the ground.
You can see the treetops when suddenly you slip from the saddle and fall. You crash through branches; leaves whip across your face. Then you hit the ground.

Lose 2-12 Stamina points (the roll of two dice). If still alive, you look up but there is no sign of the horse or its rider. Note on your Ship’s Manifest that the ship is at Yellowport and then turn to 596 in The War-Torn Kingdom.
